channel.title: How do I make some arrows shoot faster and add new range projectiles?
channel.description:
How do I make some arrows shoot faster and add new range projectiles? easy rsc source
and how could I make some magic spells increase arrow dmg/ shoot multiple arrows

item.title: How do I make some arrows shoot faster and add new range projectiles?

@rampagepkz wrote:

thx, how would I make a magic spell shoot multiple arrows? with each the same damage as rune arrows

item.title: How do I make some arrows shoot faster and add new range projectiles?
item.dc:creator: @yong_min yong min
item.description:
@yong_min wrote:

Identify where in your Sprites.rscd the projectiles start from.

public static final int SPRITE_PROJECTILE_START = 3160;
List<Npc> npcsInView = owner.viewArea.getNpcsInView();

for(Npc n : npcsInView) {
     Projectile projectile = new Projectile(owner, n, 5); // The '5' is what you will change for your new projectile. 5 is the projectile for the cannon ball
     // Method to get the player's who you want to inform of the projectile
    for(Player p : playersToInform) {
           p.informOfProjectile(projectile);
           p.informOfModifiedHits(n);
    }
}

As for the power of each arrow, check the following method in your Formulae class.

private static double arrowPower(int arrowID) {
public static int calcRangeHit(int rangeLvl, int rangeEquip, int armourEquip, int arrowID) {
